p:
The study vaccine GLS-5300 was manufactured at VGXI (The Woodlands, TX, USA) according to good manufacturing practices. GLS-5300 contains 6 mg/mL of plasmid pGX9101 in sterile water for injection. Plasmid pGX9101 contains a gene insert designed as an optimised, full-length, microconsensus of the MERS coronavirus S-glycoprotein generated from publicly available clinical sequences up to August 2015.
10
